data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=g8pLXug5dP4Q7kNvgEGxWiK&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AAINX50Djrv5bf-5f8fPPng&oh=00_AYDXS8KWHFw3mOwDhWjN5uM-tVuA35QJAAOAaPyv8xJwEg&oe=668685B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NoCDCCQsr3gQ7kNvgGphm_s&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AAINX50Djrv5bf-5f8fPPng&oh=00_AYADtFq9FLaqOnUbYFyxhxl3-RLp0bwZqFpIVYupLZC2HA&oe=66869352)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bx5VbVmmPwYQ7kNvgF1S1sh&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AAINX50Djrv5bf-5f8fPPng&oh=00_AYCe2lGY_Xx5_IgI7eqCOeA48kXlZxIEhVp47njLEEMszg&oe=66867E89)
